text:
LocateAI | Software Engineers | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE, FULL TIME

LocateAI is changing the way retailers think about opening new stores. We are building a platform for predicting the future success of a store using big data and machine learning. We use hundreds of thousands of data points to help national brands with their growth strategy. We're hiring for full-stack and back-end engineers.

Full job posting: https://angel.co/locateai/jobs/229663-software-engineer
